title: New: Factory Floor – Fall Back
body:
It’s been a long time coming, but the new single from the electro trio, [**Factory Floor**](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12351-video-factory-floor-two-different-ways/ "Video: Factory Floor – Two Different Ways"), is finally here for your listening pleasure.

_Fall Back_ is the first piece of music to surface from their debut record, due out on DFA later this year, since late 2011.

Stream it below.
